title: Reddit
cleaned_text: [r/autism](/r/autism/) WE ARE PROTESTING REDDITS API THIRD PARTY APP INCREASE. Please Google this subject for more info. Fuck you /u/spez. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Autism news, information and support. Please feel free to submit articles to enhance the knowledge, acceptance, understanding and research of Autism and ASD. I got the idea for this comic and had to make it, this is exactly what happened though as the doctor who "proved" vaccines cause autism was proven to have falsified records. This applies to just about everything else Autism Speaks has claimed. Character on top belongs to me, she's my sona/mascot character
